order by CMNTY_NOTICE_YN desc, cmnty_reg_dt desc) b

select C.cmnty_no,C.emp_id,C.co_cd,C.atch_file_cd,C.cmnty_type, C.cmnty_ttl,C.cmnty_reg_dt,C.cmnty_mdfcn_dt,C.cmnty_cn,C.cmnty_del_yn, C.cmnty_inq_cnt,C.cmnty_notice_yn,C.cmnty_prvt_pst_yn, c.ATCH_FILE_DEL_YN, c.ATCH_FILE_REG_DT, D.ATCH_FILE_DETAIL_CD, D.ATCH_FILE_DETAIL_PATH_NM, D.ATCH_FILE_DETAIL_EXTN_NM, D.ATCH_FILE_DETAIL_SIZE, D.ATCH_FILE_DETAIL_FANCYSIZE, D.ATCH_FILE_DETAIL_ORGNL_NM, D.ATCH_FILE_DETAIL_STRG_NM, D.ATCH_FILE_DETAIL_REG_DT, D.ATCH_FILE_DETAIL_DEL_YN FROM (SELECT C.cmnty_no,C.emp_id,C.co_cd,C.atch_file_cd,C.cmnty_type, C.cmnty_ttl,C.cmnty_reg_dt,C.cmnty_mdfcn_dt,C.cmnty_cn,C.cmnty_del_yn, C.cmnty_inq_cnt,C.cmnty_notice_yn,C.cmnty_prvt_pst_yn, a.ATCH_FILE_DEL_YN, a.ATCH_FILE_REG_DT FROM COMMUNITY c LEFT OUTER JOIN ATCH_FILE A ON (c.ATCH_FILE_CD = A.ATCH_FILE_CD) ) c LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * from ATCH_FILE_DETAIL where ATCH_FILE_DETAIL_DEL_YN = 'N') d ON (c.ATCH_FILE_CD = d.ATCH_FILE_CD) where c.CMNTY_NO = #{cmntyNo}

SELECT atch_file_detail_cd ,atch_file_cd ,atch_file_detail_path_nm ,atch_file_detail_extn_nm ,atch_file_detail_size ,atch_file_detail_fancysize ,atch_file_detail_orgnl_nm ,atch_file_detail_strg_nm ,atch_file_detail_reg_dt ,emp_id ,atch_file_detail_del_yn FROM atch_file_detail WHERE atch_file_cd = #{atchFileCd} and atch_file_detail_del_yn = 'N'

mapper.select:
select count(*) from (SELECT row_number() over (order by cmnty_reg_dt desc) rnum, C.CMNTY_NO CMNTY_NO, C.EMP_ID QSTN_EMP_ID, C.CO_CD CO_CD, C.CMNTY_TYPE CMNTY_TYPE, C.CMNTY_TTL CMNTY_TTL, C.CMNTY_REG_DT CMNTY_REG_DT, C.CMNTY_MDFCN_DT CMNTY_MDFCN_DT, C.CMNTY_CN CMNTY_CN, C.CMNTY_DEL_YN CMNTY_DEL_YN, C.CMNTY_INQ_CNT CMNTY_INQ_CNT, C.COM_DTL_CD COM_DTL_CD, C.CMNTY_QSTN_STTS_YN CMNTY_QSTN_STTS_YN, C.CMNTY_PRVT_PST_YN CMNTY_PRVT_PST_YN, D.COM_CD COM_CD, D.COM_DTL_CD_NM COM_DTL_CD_NM FROM COMMUNITY C inner join COMMON_DETAIL_CODE D on (c.com_dtl_cd = d.com_dtl_cd) where CMNTY_TYPE = 'Qstn' and CMNTY_DEL_YN = 'N'
and c.COM_DTL_CD = #{cmntyType}
and c.CMNTY_QSTN_STTS_YN = 'N'
order by cmnty_reg_dt desc) b

SELECT C.cmnty_no, C.emp_id as qstn_emp_id, C.co_cd, C.atch_file_cd, C.cmnty_type ,C.cmnty_ttl, C.cmnty_reg_dt, C.cmnty_mdfcn_dt, C.cmnty_cn, C.cmnty_del_yn ,C.cmnty_inq_cnt, C.cmnty_notice_yn, C.com_dtl_cd, d.com_dtl_cd_nm, C.cmnty_qstn_stts_yn, C.cmnty_prvt_pst_yn, M.COMMENT_NO, M.EMP_ID as answr_emp_id, M.CMNT_CN, M.CMNT_REG_DT, M.UP_CMNT_NO FROM community C INNER JOIN common_detail_code d on (c.com_dtl_cd = d.com_dtl_cd) lEFT OUTER JOIN COMMEMT M ON (C.CMNTY_NO = M.CMNTY_NO) WHERE c.cmnty_no = #{cmntyNo}
mapper.update: update commemt set CMNT_CN = #{cmntCn}, CMNT_REG_DT = sysdate where COMMENT_NO = #{commentNo}
mapper.select:
select COM_DTL_CD, CMNTY_TYPE, nvl(cmntyQstnSttsYCount, 0) as cmntyQstnSttsYCount, nvl(cmntyQstnSttsNCount, 0) as cmntyQstnSttsNCount, nvl(cmntyQstnAllcount, 0) as cmntyQstnAllcount, nvl(cmntyQstnSttsAllN, 0) as cmntyQstnSttsAllN from (select a.COM_DTL_CD, a.CMNTY_TYPE, a.cmntyQstnSttsYCount, b.cmntyQstnSttsNCount, null as cmntyQstnAllcount, null as cmntyQstnSttsAllN from (select COM_DTL_CD, count(*) as cmntyQstnSttsYCount, CMNTY_TYPE from community where CMNTY_TYPE = 'Qstn' and CMNTY_QSTN_STTS_YN = 'Y' group by COM_DTL_CD, CMNTY_TYPE) a inner join (select a.COM_DTL_CD, nvl(cmntyQstnSttsNCount, 0) as cmntyQstnSttsNCount from (select COM_DTL_CD from community where CMNTY_TYPE = 'Qstn' group by COM_DTL_CD) a left outer join (select COM_DTL_CD, count(*) as cmntyQstnSttsNCount from community where CMNTY_TYPE = 'Qstn' and CMNTY_QSTN_STTS_YN = 'N' group by COM_DTL_CD) b on (a.COM_DTL_CD = b.COM_DTL_CD)) b on (a.COM_DTL_CD = b.COM_DTL_CD)
union
select null as COM_DTL_CD, null as CMNTY_TYPE, null as cmntyQstnSttsYCount, null as cmntyQstnSttsNCount, c.cmntyQstnAllcount, d.cmntyQstnSttsAllN from (select CMNTY_TYPE, count(*) as cmntyQstnAllcount from community where CMNTY_TYPE = 'Qstn' group by CMNTY_TYPE) c inner join (select CMNTY_TYPE, count(*) as cmntyQstnSttsAllN from community where CMNTY_TYPE = 'Qstn' and CMNTY_QSTN_STTS_YN = 'N' group by CMNTY_TYPE) d on (c.CMNTY_TYPE = d.CMNTY_TYPE) )

select b.* from (SELECT row_number() over (order by CMNTY_NOTICE_YN desc, cmnty_reg_dt desc) rnum, CMNTY_NO , EMP_ID , CO_CD , ATCH_FILE_CD , CMNTY_TYPE , CMNTY_TTL , CMNTY_REG_DT , CMNTY_MDFCN_DT , CMNTY_CN , CMNTY_DEL_YN , CMNTY_INQ_CNT, CMNTY_NOTICE_YN FROM COMMUNITY where CMNTY_TYPE = 'GroNotice' and CMNTY_DEL_YN = 'N' order by CMNTY_NOTICE_YN desc, cmnty_reg_dt desc) b
where b.rnum >= 1 and b.rnum <= 6
